content: Multitool metal plunge cut blade BiM metal plunge cutting blade for the oscillating multitool, for plunge cuts in thin metal and aluminum ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Multi-tool inserts- ### FEATURES:Features Increased versatility – quickly swap out plunge cut blade attachments to cover a wide range of base materials and applications More sustainable - adapt the Hilti SMT-6 multitool for different applications and base materials by switching inserts, without stocking multiple tools More flexibility – Starlock interface is compatible with all Starlock multitools on the market Easier to change inserts - Starlock compatible interface for a safer and more convenient tool-free insert change Applications BiM blade for plunge cuts and cut-outs in thin metals and aluminium Expand the range of applications possible with the Hilti multitool ### TECHNICAL DATA: ### ITEMS- 2368502 - Plunge cut blade SMT BiM metal - Package Size 1 pc - 3867281 - Plunge Cut Blade Metal (3-Pack) - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 3x Plunge cut blade SMT BiM metal
